HIS BRITANNIC MAJESTY'S GOVERNMENT.)oohfipential I c.p.4113.acabinet.GOVERNMENT___BUSINESS .(Previous Papers C.P.4-0S4 and CP.4099)The following7"correction to C-P.4113 was approved by the Cabinet to-day, and is circulated for information.(Sgd) M.P.A.EMKBY.2, Whitehall Gardens, S.w.l. 24th July, 1922.paragraph ( d) (i)la) Milk is to bo excluded from the operation of the War Charges (Validity) Bill.
